page.title: 08THORNTON COLLEGE
page.content: INTERVIEW WITH{HEADMISTRESS The Sister has been head of Thornton College for fifteen years.She became a nun because she wanted to work for Jesus Christ and to help other people to understand him. There are a total of 346 pupils.The catchment area is Buckingham and Milton Keynes.The winter uniform is a white blouse,grey skirt,grey and red cardigan and tie.It changes to no tie and short-sleeved blouses.The girls range from five to sixteen years old and have to leave after O'Levels.The{school}'s curriculum is not dominated by Roman Catholicism.{ { Every year the Friends of Thornton hold an annual Summer Fete.The school is partially funded by the fees paid as it is a{private school.
